DataElement.preferredDefinition: The email address of the study CRA responsible for managing specimens.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._A person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution._A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered.

A person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution.

Property.preferredDefinition: An e-mail address identifies a location to which e-mail can be delivered. A modern Internet e-mail address (using SMTP) is a string of the form jsmith@domain.example. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: contact information for communications over distance, including telephone and fax numbers, e-mail, and web addresses.
